title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 158.3 - Sieves
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 158.3 - Sieves

State Regulations

Fineness shall be measured in reference to a 20-mesh and
100-mesh sieve only. The sieves used shall be full height, eight-inch diameter, of the United States standard sieve series; so-called Tyler sieves, as adopted
by the American Society for Testing and Materials (see A.S.T.M. Designation: E-11-61), the National Bureau of Standards and the Association of Official

Agricultural Chemists. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
158.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
